prompts: Create a unique Pokemon that can transform into any shape or form.
I want a Pokemon that changes its appearance based on its surroundings.
Generate a creature that can mimic other Pokemon in battles.
Make an amorphous Pokemon with a playful personality and soft edges.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into various habitats effortlessly.
Design a Pokemon known for its trickster nature and adaptability.
Show me a shape-shifting Pokemon with a simple, smooth silhouette.
